compatibility.notes: LGPL-3.0-or-later allows linking with proprietary software under certain conditions, but static linking may impose stricter requirements.

key_requirements: Include a copy of the LGPL license when distributing the Library or Combined Works.
State any changes made to the Library when distributing modified versions.
Ensure that the object code of an Application can be conveyed under terms of your choice if it incorporates material from the Library's header files.
license.name: LGPL-3.0-or-later
obligations: If you modify the Library, you must convey the modified version under the same license or the GNU GPL.
You must provide the Corresponding Source for the Combined Work when distributing it.
You must ensure that the facility operates meaningfully even if the Application does not supply the required function or data.
